TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class AuthenticationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Web 应用程序的身份验证。

span.span: Configures the authentication for a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `authentication` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `authentication` section of a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 可以将信息写入根据定义的部分属性的限制的配置文件的相关节其值是。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构不允许层次结构中的配置文件中写入任何尝试会对由分析器生成的错误消息中。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，此类可用于读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 有关安全性和可伸缩性，建议你使用外部存储库，例如数据库、 保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何指定以声明方式中的多个属性的值`authentication`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。The first demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `authentication` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 第二个演示如何使用类。The second demonstrates how to use the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`authentication`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `authentication` section. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用`credentials`部分中，请务必遵循在所述的准则[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended the use of an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (http://msdn.microsoft.com)为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"，和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信".For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (http://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application", and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication". ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection/CS/authenticationsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection/VB/authenticationsection.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取对象。The following code example shows how to obtain a object.
